projects.description: I was a Software Engineer on this project. Though that was my title, on top of my coding React components and Managing Redux state, I did Mockups, UX design, and created all the icons for this App. Also worth noting my photoshop skills came in handy many times for quick turn arounds when images provided by Artist did not meet the coding requirements. My main patches of pride are the universal image component I made and the multi-teir filtering system

aboutCards.title: Engineer
aboutCards.description: Web Applications , Video Games and even Virtual Reality. Having programed on a variety of platforms as well as languages,  I have been challenged to work within restraints while providing optimal quality. My main languages are Javascript and Python, but I have programmed in so many more. I love problem solving and I am adaptable with a continuous learning attitude.

aboutCards.title: Artist
aboutCards.description: I went to The Art Institute of San Diego for a BS focused in Media Arts and Animation. There I received a solid foundation of the Adobe Suite, 3d Modeling Programs, Video game engines and Traditional Art Skills. Shortly after I began a career as a 3d Artist at Electronic Arts. Having an artistic background has given me the unique perspective to find creative solutions for complex problems.

aboutCards.title: Animator
aboutCards.description: Traditional 2d animation, 3d rigged characters and animated web elements, I have done them all. Understanding the laws of motion, when to bend and break the rules, has given me and advantage when creating user interfaces and animated characters. Animation adds a layer of quality, a pleasing aesthetic to any project. Having a foundation in animation I can bring subtle, appealing touches that will bring the project to life.
